text: Joseph Paul Opatz (born July 23, 1952) is an American politician in the state of Minnesota. He served in the Minnesota House of Representatives.https://www.leg.state.mn.us/legdb/fulldetail?ID=10492 ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:People from St. Cloud, Minnesota Category:Minnesota Democrats Category:Members of the Minnesota House of Representatives
title: Joe Opatz
